results.title: [Effect of metformin on the incidence of venous thromboembolism in medical inpatients during hospitalization].
results.text_hl: Similarly, the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Embolism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011655 @@@PTE@@@ was lower in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group (OR=0.557, 95%CI: 0.350 to 0.885).

citations.NLM: Huang WY, Yan XY, Chen YR. [Effect of metformin on the incidence of venous thromboembolism in medical inpatients during hospitalization]. Zhonghua Yi Xue Za Zhi. 2025 Sep 23;105(36):3208-3213. PMID: 41017352
citations.BibTeX: @article{41017352, title={[Effect of metformin on the incidence of venous thromboembolism in medical inpatients during hospitalization].}, author={Huang WY and Yan XY and Chen YR}, journal={Zhonghua Yi Xue Za Zhi}, volume={105}, number={36}, pages={3208-3213}}

results.title: Association of Metformin Use With Risk of Venous Thromboembolism in Adults With Type 2 Diabetes: A General-Population-Based Cohort Study.
results.text_hl: The corresponding risks for @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Embolism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011655 @@@pulmonary embolism@@@ (adjusted HR = 0.71, 95% CI: 0.50, 1.01) and @DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@deep vein thrombosis@@@ (adjusted HR = 0.64, 95% CI: 0.48, 0.87) were also lower in @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ initiators than in @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylurea@@@ initiators.

citations.NLM: Sha T, Zhang Y, Li C, Lei G, Wu J, Li X, Yang Z, Zeng C, Wei J. Association of Metformin Use With Risk of Venous Thromboembolism in Adults With Type 2 Diabetes: A General-Population-Based Cohort Study. Am J Epidemiol. 2022 Mar 24;191(5):856-866. PMID: 34999759
